name: Bosco's Last Stand
description:
I am a large fan of the game Deep Rock Glactic by Ghost Ship Games (go check it out) and thought it would be cool if there was an arcade machine in the space rig. Then I went wait, I kind of know how to make simple games. So here we go. My take on a top down arcade shooter based on Drg.

Rock And Stone

----------------------------------------------

Controls:

W,A,S,D = movement

Left click = fire

Right click = rocket

------------------------------------------------

Note: bugs spawn where you can see particles on the ground!

There are some more features I am going to add so check back in a bit.
